name: The Night of the Undead (Losmix)
description: The Night of the Undead is a 2D game made for Weekly Game Jam (Week 144-Theme: In the Dark) where you try to survive as long as you can. Every night more and more zombies will spawn and try to kill you. If you kill them and survive the night you have to destroy their bodies to prevent them from resurrecting. Destroying corpses makes you loose sanity. To regain sanity and heal up you have to sleep and when you wake up the cycle continues. Loosing sanity will result in countless zombies spawning and your certain death.
